unnormalised: Gen. Bakshi (Retd.) thinks the new combat boots are so comfy, he might just start wearing them to his kitty parties! Apparently, even seasoned veterans need arch support for those killer dance moves. #MilitaryFashion #ComfortIsKey
normalised: General Bakshi (Retired) thinks the new combat boots are so comfy, he might just start wearing them to his kitty parties! Apparently, even seasoned veterans need arch support for those killer dance moves. Hash Military Fashion Hash Comfort Is Key.

unnormalised: Seriously though, the Defence Ministry’s procurement of these boots has raised eyebrows. Is it really necessary to give the *Subedar Majors* orthopaedic footwear while our jawans are scaling mountains in canvas shoes that probably date back to the 1971 war? A bit of priority reassessment wouldn’t hurt, eh?
normalised: Seriously though, the Defence Ministry’s procurement of these boots has raised eyebrows. Is it really necessary to give the Subedar Majors orthopaedic footwear while our jawans are scaling mountains in canvas shoes that probably date back to the one thousand nine hundred and seventy one war? A bit of priority reassessment wouldn’t hurt, eh?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, sources whisper that Col. Sharma (a.k.a. "Eagle Eye") has requested a personalized jetpack to avoid traffic jams on the way to HQ. Claims it would dramatically improve his response time to national security threats. We're still waiting for confirmation on whether this is official or just a side effect of spending too much time near the firing range fumes.
normalised: Meanwhile, sources whisper that Colonel Sharma (a.k.a. "Eagle Eye") has requested a personalized jetpack to avoid traffic jams on the way to H-Q. Claims it would dramatically improve his response time to national security threats. We're still waiting for confirmation on whether this is official or just a side effect of spending too much time near the firing range fumes.

unnormalised: And the *Naik* who suggested replacing the army bugle with a techno remix of the national anthem? Promoted to Head of Innovative Sound Solutions (self-proclaimed title, of course). Because nothing says "dawn attack" like a sick beat drop.
normalised: And the Naik who suggested replacing the army bugle with a techno remix of the national anthem? Promoted to Head of Innovative Sound Solutions (self-proclaimed title, of course). Because nothing says "dawn attack" like a sick beat drop.

unnormalised: All jokes aside, hope they're also getting some good chai up there at the front. Even Gen. Bakshi agrees on the strategic importance of a good cuppa.
normalised: All jokes aside, hope they're also getting some good chai up there at the front. Even General Bakshi agrees on the strategic importance of a good cuppa.
